title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the AICodeReviewer system. This includes identifying the types of code analysis to be performed, such as syntax checks, style guidelines enforcement, unit testing, security vulnerabilities detection, and performance optimization. Additionally, outline the programming languages and frameworks supported, desired user interface (UI) design, integration points with existing tools like GitHub, Bitbucket, or GitLab, and any necessary API requirements. Furthermore, consider accessibility standards, scalability, and potential future integrations.

title: Design System Architecture (Revised)
description: Revise the design of the overall architecture of the AICodeReviewer system. Include detailed descriptions of the main components, their interactions, data flow, and integration points. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability concerns. The following components should be addressed: a web-based user interface, a code analysis engine, a code repository integration, a database for storing analysis results and project data, and a notification system. Address the following additional considerations: modularity, extensibility, and monitoring/logging. Update the design to support real-time analysis where feasible.

title: Develop Code Analysis Engine
description: Implement the core code analysis engine that can parse and analyze source code, identify potential issues, and suggest improvements.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Develop the user interface for the AICodeReviewer system, including the ability to submit code repositories or pull requests, view analysis results, and manage settings.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline for the AICodeReviewer system, including automated builds, testing, and deployment to staging and production environments.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Checks
description: Integrate security and compliance checks into the code analysis engine, including checks for vulnerabilities, data privacy, and regulatory compliance.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Strategy
description: Define and implement a comprehensive testing and quality assurance strategy for the AICodeReviewer system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation and user guides for the AICodeReviewer system, including installation instructions, usage examples, and API references.
dependencies: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Strategy
